name: portfolio
title: Portfolio
desc: Share your hard work with this portfolio starter from the Astro team.
article:
Showcase your creative work with a theme full of soft gradients, purple hues, and rounded corners. This theme by the Astro design team features a dynamic landing page for highlighting your skills and recent projects.

  • Theme toggle: Users can easily choose light or dark mode
  • Don't miss a lead: Clear contact call-to-action on all pages
  • Type-safe frontmatter: Projects powered by Astro v2âs content collections
  • Clean icons: 20 stylish Phosphor Icons built in

github.name: astro
github.description: The web framework for content-driven websites. ⭐️ Star to support our work!
